page.title: 04Population
page.content: The population of our area is mostly{ {retired people}because young people cannot afford to buy the houses that are for sale. The population is less than years ago bacause less men are needed to work the farms and women are having about 5 children less each. Many families such as the { {Arkells,Browns and Hitchmans}can trace their families back for many years and most of their relations either came to {Temple Guiting School}or went to{ {Cutsdean school }when it was open. Many of the families are related to each other.
